short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple unblocked browser game launcher.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension:
- Makes it simpler to open browser games without any further installation
- Has 21 games (in the current update)
- Has a fresh and dark UI that everyone will enjoy
- Several different categories of games

WARNING:
If your school has blocked some of the websites that the games are hosted on you may not be able to play some of the games. I would suggest using a VPN (if you can) or a hotspot in that case.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Changelog:

Update 1.0.0:
- Release!
- 7 starting games

Update 1.0.1:
- 3 new games
- Sports category

Update 1.0.2:
- New icons

Update 1.0.3: 
- Theme refresh (New icons, new background, new font)
- Footer at bottom of page with credits and a link to the Webstore page
- Removed the "Offbrand Fortnites" category (Games from that category have been moved to Gun)
- Renamed Vehicle to Driving/Racing
- Added 3 new categories (Educational, Clicker, and Misc.)
- Added 11 new games

Update 1.0.4:
- The extension's icon now appears at the top of the game list

- Added 2 new categories (Obstacle/Puzzle and Runner)

- Replaced 1V1.LOL 3.900 with 1V1.LOL 4.705
- Renamed "Gun" category to "Shooter"
- Some links have been changed to another website

Update 1.0.6:
- Fixed HTML issue at the bottom of the extension
- Added 1 new game
- Renamed "Scratch" category to "Coding"

Update 1.0.7:
